name: ChowTime
0:
”Alexa, tell Chow Time I'm hungry”
”Alexa, ask Chow Time What should I eat?”
”Alexa, open Chow Time”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chow time
des: Just ask Alexa, "What should I eat?" or any other regular question about eating and she'll give you a food to make, buy, or salivate over. This brings the ease of deciding what or where to eat, right to your Alexa device, wherever it may be in your house.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
